attributes.action: cap the amount of expenses polititions are able to claim and to compel them to produce receipts to substantiate their claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the public, when submitting a claim for working expenses must produce receipts to verify that claim and are limited to the amount that can be claimed. Polititians should so be treated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
